name: Galvanized Vest
flavorText: There's an interesting seal signed in blood on the metal inside of the armor. It probably shouldn't be tampered with.
flavorTextHtml: There's an interesting seal signed in blood on the metal inside of the armor. It probably shouldn't be tampered with.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Gain 4 seconds of Momentum when attacking with a Primary skill, at a maximum duration of 20 seconds. Your Primary skills deal 10% increased damage per second of Momentum.(4) Set:     
 Strafing against enemies will automatically shoot your last used primary skill, and also give 60% damage reduction while strafing and for 5 seconds after. While Strafing, you gain 8% increased movement speed for each second of Momentum.(6) Set:     
 Your primary skills deal 15,000% increased damage.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Gain 4 seconds of Momentum when attacking with a Primary skill, at a maximum duration of 20 seconds. Your Primary skills deal 10% increased damage per second of Momentum.
(4) Set:
Strafing against enemies will automatically shoot your last used primary skill, and also give 60% damage reduction while strafing and for 5 seconds after. While Strafing, you gain 8% increased movement speed for each second of Momentum.
(6) Set:
Your primary skills deal 15,000% increased damage.
